roleset.name: be like a bird
roleset.note: ROOST-V NOTES: Thank god we're avoiding the 'do agents always have intentionality'argument, or we'd have to argue about whether chickens haveintentionality, which implies a degree of consciousness. Yucko. (from roost.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: It might be alleged that TV has done more than its share topopularize and promote non-violent civil disobedience, so the secondsituation hypothesized above would be simply a case of ``chickens-1coming home *trace*-1 to roost.''
